snippet: Friends of Abe will be recognized by the Internal Revenue Service as a tax-exempt organization. Gary Sinise, Jon Voight and Kelsey Grammer have been publicly associated with the group.
abstract: Friends of Abe will be recognized by the Internal Revenue Service as a tax-exempt organization. Gary Sinise, Jon Voight and Kelsey Grammer have been publicly associated with the group.

headline.main: Hollywood Conservatives Are Granted Tax-Exempt Status
